## Source: kam193 (ccc059efb56cb7ca8b8c413c9b0711b900e5b98d371c30e58b3a5056f5c06d18)
---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.


Campaign: baidu-readver


Reasons (based on the campaign):


 - The package contains code to exfiltrate basic data from the system, like IP or username. It has a limited risk.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6999b5e1cf4a39c5ee73a61b953c0592465267806362b2485d61f8372242370d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'nt4padyp3' @ 0.0.2 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
